Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: andy1mac
Reviews.Content: paid £20 double cheap dubai exceptional value ok jebel ali stop metro cheap £110 city isnt issue takes hour city sights adequate particularly youre type beds comfortable easy facilities pay extra luxuries example cleaning towels changing etc additional bill 0 recommend drawback cab towards city starts wrong due motorway system start metro

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money”
Reviews.Author: Rodeoankie
Reviews.Content: hi stayed 2 nights hotel business client jebel ali simply limited spending nights dubai based jebel ali bet unless 45 star lover hotel including bathrooms clean kept std adequate spend night tv 4 free channels including dubai english movies channel bed comfy theres safe study table theres inhouse restaurant serves fresh food affordable menu welcoming owner vending machines beverages chocolates 23 aed internet 10 15 aed 6 hours 30 days speed available via wireless depending floor benefit negative accessibility city unless ok walk 700 meters metro station trying dubai taxi cost fortune taxi towards abu dhabi uturn 68 km ahead metro hotel shuttle car metro stn hassle experience recommend spend live basic dubai upto week
